rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0001
rows.name: Hey! Listen up! I've seen something!

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I saw some shadowy folk gathered
in the middle of the night in a
spot just outside Iyasaki.

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0003
rows.name:
At least I think they were people...
Could have been animals too... Bit
bigger than a Nopon, I reckon.

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Can't bear to think that a quiet
village like Iyasaki might be
attacked... That'd be beyond the pale!

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Till we find out what's going
on, I'd like some more guards
to help protect the village...

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0006
rows.name: You'll do it?! Oh, that's a relief!

rows.label: tlk47300164_04_msg0007
rows.name: Take care while you're on duty!
